name: Majesty Lord Blaster
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If "Blaster Blade" and "Blaster Dark" are in your soul, this unit gets [Critical] +1, and if this unit is on (VC), it gets [Power] +5000/drive +1.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][put two rear-guards into your soul], and get two Imaginary Gift:Force.

name: Blaster Blade
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you have four or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the front row, and retire it.

name: Blaster Blade
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you have four or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the front row, and retire it.

name: Blaster Dark
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, and retires it.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent has no rear-guards, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
[CONT]:This card is also a 《Royal Paladin》.

name: Blaster Dark
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, and retires it.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent has no rear-guards, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
[CONT]:This card is also a 《Royal Paladin》.

name: Star Call Trumpeter
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], return a card with "Blaster" in its card name and a "When Light and Darkness Intersects" each from your drop zone to your hand.
[CONT]:If you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Wingal Brave
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Blaster" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Cloud Lancer, Gmoris
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, put up to one grade 2 card from your drop zone on the top or bottom of your deck. If you put a card, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Knight of the Harp, Tristan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Blaster Blade", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Pluck Enchanter
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your "Blaster Blade" is placed, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. If you [Soul-Charge], and there are no face up cards in your damage zone, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Barcgal
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Flash Shield, Iseult
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Yggdrasil Maiden, Elaine
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: When Light and Darkness Intersects
effect:
Resolve one of the effects below, and shuffle your deck.
・If "Blaster Blade" is on your (VC) or (RC), search your deck for up to one "Blaster Dark", reveal it and put it into your hand.
・If "Blaster Dark" is on your (VC) or (RC), search your deck for up to one "Blaster Blade", reveal it and put it into your hand.
・If "Blaster Blade" and "Blaster Dark" are on your (VC) or (RC), search your deck for up to one "Majesty Lord Blaster", reveal it and put it into your hand..

name: Majesty Lord Blaster
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If "Blaster Blade" and "Blaster Dark" are in your soul, this unit gets [Critical] +1, and if this unit is on (VC), it gets [Power] +5000/drive +1.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][put two rear-guards into your soul], and get two Imaginary Gift:Force.

name: Quick Shield
effect:
One of your attacked units gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle!
(Card Type:Blitz Order can be used during guard step)
(This card is regarded as being from all clans)
(This card is a ticket card, and cannot be put in a deck)
